Description: Glazed steatite scarab, elaborate clypeus, pronotum marked with annules, elytra marked and humeral callosities present, double suture, feathered legs pierced longitudinally, base (chipped at edges) decorated with representation of a man, seated on throne, surrounded by repeated flower motifs.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: F A F Mariette
Condition: good (base chipped at edges and glaze faded)
